text: "Home on A Monday" is a 1977 song by Australian band Little River Band and is the third single from their third studio album Diamantina Cocktail. It went to number 12 in the Netherlands and number 73 in Australia. ==Track listing== ;Australian 7" (EMI 11522) :Side A. "Home on Monday" - 3:40 :Side B. "Raelene, Raelene" - 4:27 ;Dutch 7" (EMI 5C 006-82401) :Side A. "Home On Monday - 3:47 :Side B. "The Inner Light" - 3:25 Category:1977 songs Category:Little River Band songs
title: Home on Monday
